INSERT INTO d_ma${localChannelId} (message_id, id, content, type) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO d_mm${localChannelId} (id, message_id, date_created, status, connector_map, channel_map, response_map, errors) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
DELETE FROM d_mm${localChannelId} WHERE message_id = ?
DELETE FROM d_m${localChannelId} WHERE id = ?
DELETE FROM d_mc${localChannelId} WHERE message_id = ?
UPDATE d_mm${localChannelId} SET status = ?, send_attempts = ? WHERE id = ? AND message_id = ?
UPDATE d_mm${localChannelId} SET errors = ? WHERE id = ? AND message_id = ?
UPDATE d_mm${localChannelId} SET connector_map = ?, channel_map = ?, response_map = ? WHERE id = ? AND message_id = ?
UPDATE d_mm${localChannelId} SET response_map = ? WHERE id = ? AND message_id = ?
UPDATE d_m${localChannelId} SET processed = TRUE WHERE id = ?
SELECT channel_id, local_channel_id FROM d_channels
SELECT MAX(local_channel_id) FROM d_channels
ALTER TABLE d_mcm${localChannelId} DROP COLUMN ${columnName}
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(id), 0) FROM d_m${localChannelId}
SELECT * FROM d_m${localChannelId} WHERE processed = FALSE AND server_id = ? ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM d_mm${localChannelId} mm JOIN d_m${localChannelId} m ON m.id = mm.message_id WHERE m.processed = FALSE AND m.server_id = ? ORDER BY m.id, mm.id
INSERT INTO d_events (event_type, channel_id, metadata_id, message_id, message_status, event_date) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT metadata_id, received, filtered, transformed, pending, sent, error FROM d_ms${localChannelId}

SELECT metadata_id, received_total AS received, filtered_total AS filtered, transformed_total AS transformed, pending_total AS pending, sent_total AS sent, error_total AS error FROM d_ms${localChannelId}

INSERT INTO d_ms${localChannelId} (metadata_id, received, received_total, filtered, filtered_total, transformed, transformed_total, pending, pending_total, sent, sent_total, error, error_total) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

UPDATE d_ms${localChannelId} SET received = received + ?, received_total = received_total + ?, filtered = filtered + ?, filtered_total = filtered_total + ?, transformed = transformed + ?, transformed_total = transformed_total + ?, pending = pending + ?, pending_total = pending_total + ?, sent = sent + ?, sent_total = sent_total + ?, error = error + ?, error_total = error_total + ?
WHERE metadata_id IS NULL

UPDATE d_ms${localChannelId} SET received = received + ?, received_total = received_total + ?, filtered = filtered + ?, filtered_total = filtered_total + ?, transformed = transformed + ?, transformed_total = transformed_total + ?, pending = pending + ?, pending_total = pending_total + ?, sent = sent + ?, sent_total = sent_total + ?, error = error + ?, error_total = error_total + ?
WHERE metadata_id = ?

INSERT INTO d_channels (channel_id, local_channel_id) VALUES (?, ?)

SELECT mm.*, m.server_id FROM d_mm${localChannelId} mm JOIN d_m${localChannelId} m ON m.id = mm.message_id WHERE mm.id = ? AND mm.status = ? ORDER BY m.id OFFSET ? LIMIT ?
